reviews.review: Very good movie. Better bad guy than the others. Hope iron man will continue being in the avengers movies. 5️⃣Star!
I’m so shock of the movie I just don’t know what to say. Like I understand why and question is can you do it yourself to save the universe.
The culmination of 10 years and 17 movies brings tears to my eyes. Thank you Marvel for this. This is like when I read my comics or played with my toys. It is everything I had ever dreamed.

I love the characters of the Marvel Universe.  
    I enjoyed the first part of this movie.  There were many small battles involving a few heroes each time.  The character Thanos was greatly expanded.
    The second part of this movie was almost boring.   Just like the other two Avengers movies, the climactic battle  relies on countless hordes of generic enemies attacking the heroes.  And just like the other two movies, the generic hordes all die when a hero flips a switch (this time it's Thor). This is lazy script writing and I'm tired of it.  I'm hoping the second part of Infinty War does not use this lazy plot device.
    The ending of this movie leaves much to be desired.  I understand the second movie will be happier. This reminds me of the disaster known as The Last Jedi.

I #literallycantevenwiththisfranchise. Seriously. I...I- bawled. I talked back to the movie screen. I mean sheesh....I swear I haven't cried that much since The Boy in the Striped Pajamas. OMGOODNESS!!!!!

Es una pelicula de comics, en particular, un complicado Crossover, que una pelicula logre satisfacer las enormes espectativas en tan solo 3 horas habla de lo bien desarrollada, realizada y planteada que esta esta pelicula. La trama tiene perfecto sentido, es la primer parte de una culminación de 10 años, y no defrauda.
Little sad but expected very amazing

Movie was great! Emotional, action packed, thrilling... I did not feel like I was in a 3 hour movie. I wanted more! I can see why the numbers are in the billions. Can't for Captain Marvel! Great job Marvel Studios!
